articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: 'I wake up and check if my family in Gaza is still alive,' says Palestinian American - BBC.com
articles.description: Palestinian Americans wait for news of loved ones still in Gaza as Israel strikes back at Hamas.
articles.content:
Media caption, Watch: Drone footage shows the aftermath of Israeli airstrikes on Gaza
Dorgham Abusalim has not heard from his parents in Gaza for days. The wait is "absolutely horrifying", he says.… [+4894 chars]

articles.author: Jacqueline Howard
articles.title: Despite rocky rollout, more than 7 million Americans have received updated Covid-19 vaccines, HHS says - CNN
articles.description: This year’s uptake of the updated Covid-19 vaccine appears to be somewhat slower than last year’s, according to data from the US Department of Health and Human Services and the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
articles.content: This years uptake of the updated Covid-19 vaccine appears to be somewhat slower than last years, according to data from the US Department of Health and Human Services and the US Centers for Disease C… [+3647 chars]
